version_description: Support for Game Controllers (Gamepads and Extended Gamepads):  Accessible as an option under settings/controls.  Each control may be reassigned by clicking on it, which is useful for analog stick input on Extended Gamepads.

- Support for 64-bit processors
- Minor bug fixes

- NEW car! The Rhino now available!
- NEW driver! Play as the alien B'Zorp!
- NEW upgrade levels for cars and powerups!
- Support for iPhone X
- Updated graphics performance
- Minor bug fixes

This app has been updated by Apple to display the Apple Watch app icon.

- Privacy and SDK update
